actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the black lung benefits provisions of the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act to prevent duplicate awards in the case of certain widows.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act's black lung benefits provisions, that "widow" does not include a surviving divorced wife who is married. States that no person shall qualify as the widow of more than one miner. (Amends 30 U.S.C. 902 (e))

titles.title: A bill to amend the black lung benefits provisions of the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act to prevent duplicate awards in the case of certain widows.
